attributes.action: Decriminalise not having a television licence
attributes.background: Why are we paying it???!!! Stop now or it will get worse. It currently costs just under 40p per day to watch a tv. Even if your not watching it daily. The price is fixed until march 2017. I propose the tv licence be axed.

rejection.details: We;re not sure whether you would like the TV licence to be axed, or whether you would like non-payment to be decriminalised.
